assignments.name: Clear_ID_and_set_new_household_reference
assignments.label: Clear ID and set new household reference

assignments.name: Clear_new_account_contact_relationship_variable

collectionProcessors.name: Filter_for_relationships_for_this_household
collectionProcessors.label: Filter for relationships for this household

Flow.description: This flow is an alpha product and not ready to make visible to users generally. It should only be run by system administrators and possibly only in debug mode. The flow walks the user through splitting a household so that 2 clients can be advised independently.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores the list of active partners so that the new partners for the split clients can be confirmed.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: partnersChoiceSet

formulas.description: This formula will generate the name of the new client specific household
formulas.name: newHouseholdAccountName

Flow.label: Account | Split Household (alpha)

loops.description: Loop the relationships so they can be updated and sub-lists created
loops.name: Loop_010_All_relationships
loops.label: Loop 10: All relationships

loops.description: Loop people to create a list of children and client accounts
loops.name: Loop_020_loop_all_people
loops.label: Loop 20: loop all people

loops.description: Loop through the clients who are going to get their own households
loops.name: Loop_040_Loop_clients_to_be_split_in_to_own_households
loops.label: Loop 40: Loop clients to be split in to own households

loops.description: Loop through the children to determine whose household they should go in to
loops.name: Loop_050_Loop_children_to_assign_to_household
loops.label: Loop 50: Loop children to assign to household

loops.description: Loop the clients to create an ACR in each household
loops.name: Loop_060_clients
loops.label: Loop 60: clients

fields.name: ChildPrimaryHousehold
fields.fieldText: Which household should {!Loop_050_Loop_children_to_assign_to_household.Name} primarily be associated with?
fields.helpText: This determines which household things like JISAs and JSIPPs would sit under.

screens.description: Confirm for each client who the new partner will be
screens.name: Confirm_new_partners
screens.label: Confirm new partners

value.stringValue: Individually owned financial products to move

fields.name: InitialInstructions
fields.fieldText:
This wizard will walk you through splitting up this household into 2 new households.


Please note that this process is not reversible and must be completed in full so please do not proceed until you are ready to fully split these.

variables.description: Accounts that need to be updated
variables.name: accountsUpdateCollection

variables.description: Stores the details of a person account for a client and any updates made.
variables.name: clientAccount

variables.description: Stores the records of the clients in the household
variables.name: clients

variables.description: Stores the ID of the household that is being split.
variables.name: householdId

variables.description: New relationship for the client in their own household
variables.name: newAccountContactRelationship

variables.description: Stores the details of the new relationships that need to be inserted.
variables.name: newAccountContactRelationships

variables.description: Stores the details of a new household to be created
variables.name: newClientHousehold

variables.description: This collection will store the new households that need to be created
variables.name: newHouseholds

variables.description: Used to capture the ID of the record from which this screen flow was launched.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Stores updated versions of the original account contact relationships that need to be updated
variables.name: updatedAccountContactRelationships
